title: 1933 Colorado Silver and Gold football team
text: The 1933 Colorado Silver and Gold football team was an <a href="American%20football">American football</a> team that represented the <a href="University%20of%20Colorado%20Boulder">University of Colorado</a> as a member of the <a href="Rocky%20Mountain%20Athletic%20Conference">Rocky Mountain Conference</a> (RMC) during the <a href="1933%20college%20football%20season">1933 college football season</a>. Led by second-year head coach Head coach <a href="Bill%20Saunders">Bill Saunders</a>, Colorado compiled an overall record of 7–2 with an mark of 5–2 in conference play, placing fourth in the RMC.
